articles.description: L&T share buyback: The buyback price stands at Rs 3,200, and the share offered for buyback is 3.12 crore. On Monday, in the morning deals, L&Ts stock was trading at Rs 2,922.85 on the BSE, up 0.41 per cent against Fridays close.
